original_title: SF resigns from Sectoral Oversight Committee on National Security
original_body_lines: SJB MP Field Marshal Sarath Fonseka has resigned as a member of the Sectoral Oversight Committee on National Security, Deputy Speaker Ajith Rajapaksha announced today.
He told Parliament that SJB MP Rauff Hakeem has been appointed by the Committee of Selection to fill the vacancy. (Ajith Siriwardana and Yohan Perera)
